idea-plugin.name: JBehave Table Formatter
idea-plugin.description:
The plugin provides a convenient way for formatting Example Tables in JBehave .story files to have same column length.
All table rows must be delimited with '|'. Line of table must start from '|' to be formatted.
Alt+Shift+E or Right click in editor area -> Format example tables
Based on the work of: Alex Rybkin

action.description: Format jBehave tables of the opened file
